WorkItem.Description:
I was consistently getting a different value for Stamina, Agility, and Intellect between Rawr and the in-game tooltip.  After removing all gear and respecing to an empty spec, I discovered that the base value for these 3 stats are off by one between Rawr and in-game.  Changing CalculationMoonkin.cs to use the following values Tauren makes Rawr agree with the in-game tooltip:
Â 
Health = 7416f,
Mana = 3496f,
Stamina = 99f,
Agility = 78f,
Intellect = 139f,
Spirit = 161f

Comments.Message: Now, see, I wish there was a comprehensive list of all these somewhere that I could reference.  I will update for next version.
Issue has been fixed in source and will be in the next build.
